flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to save up $4 x 100 = <<4*100=400>>400
He has 4 months to earn this money because 12 - 4 = <<12-4=4>>4
He needs to earn $100 a month because 400 / 4 = <<400/4=100>>100
He needs to do 10 tasks a month because 100 / 10 = <<100/10=10>>10
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 4. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
